content: HIT-RE 100 Epoxy anchor High-performance injectable epoxy mortar with everyday approvals for anchoring and rebar connections in concrete ### Categories: Home > Products > Fasteners > Chemical anchors- - - ### FEATURES:Features Good performance in cracked and uncracked concrete Suitable for indoor and outdoor applications as well as use in a wide variety of base material conditions - dry, wet, water-filled (depending on rod specification and approvals) Long working time allows greater flexibility in installation Extensive range of accessories available (e.g. piston plugs, steel brushes, cordless electric dispenser) Easy cleaning method simplifying installation Applications Substitution of misplaced / missing rebars Renovation / upgrades with post-installed rebars Rebar doweling / connection of secondary post-installed rebars Anchoring secondary steel elements Anchoring structural steel connections (e.g. steel columns, beams) For approval or certificate information, please see individual items. ### TECHNICAL DATA: Base materials: Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) Approvals / Test reports: ICC-ES report (concrete) IBC compliance: IBC 2015, IBC 2018 Technical Data | Base materials | Concrete (cracked), Concrete (uncracked) | Base material condition (as per approval) | Dry, Submerged, Water-filled, Wet | Approvals / Test reports | ICC-ES report (concrete) | IBC compliance | IBC 2015, IBC 2018 | Seismic loading | Yes | PROFIS Software | Yes | Anchoring elements | Rebar | Cleaning procedures | Automatic Cleaning (SafeSet Hollow Drill Bit), Compressed-Air Cleaning, Manual Cleaning | Storage and transportation temperature range | 41 - 77 °F | In-service temperature – range | -40 - 158 °F | Type of fixing (global) | Pre-fastening, Through-fastening ### ITEMS- 2123381 - Epoxy adh RE 100 11.1oz/330ml - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x Foil pack - 1x Mixer - 3937856 - RE-100 330ml (11.1oz)+ HDM store promo - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 1x HDM 500 Dispenser assy - 10x Foil pack - 10x Mixer - 1x 500ml Cassette black - 3537468 - RE 100 11.1oz/330ml MC - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x Foil pack - 25x Mixer - 3962961 - RE 100 1 MC 330ml w/ Black Cart. - Package Size 1 pc Package Contents: - 25x Foil pack - 25x Mixer -
